Does how much damage you take in battle affect lifespan?
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Does how much damage you take in battle affect lifespan?
By Peter on Tuesday, May 26, 2009 - 03:48 am:

I looked at some user submitted cheats at Cheat
Codes Galore and it said that how much damage you
take in battle does affect life span.

Is this true or just another hoax?

By Elf* on Tuesday, May 26, 2009 - 05:09 am:

99% sure it's not true

By Lisa Shock on Tuesday, May 26, 2009 - 11:17 am:

Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 2 Archive (PSOne): FAQ: The Most Important Game Data: Effects of Battle on Fatigue and Stress.

The above is not true, with the exception of getting the monster killed in battle. It is, however, possible to lower lifespan because of the large amount of fatigue caused by battles. The only relation damage has is in how the final scoring winds up. See DP's thread above, for exact numbers.
